Title: EU AI Act - Governance Rules
Summary: Establishes the governance structure for AI in the EU.
Impact Notes: Significant impact on prohibited practices and GPAI developers.

Title: Executive Order 14110 - AI Safety
Summary: Directs agencies to set new standards for AI safety and security.
Impact Notes: Focus on testing 'red-teaming' and security reporting.

Title: M-24-10 Advancing AI Governance
Summary: Memo to federal agencies on managing AI risks in procurement.
Impact Notes: Agencies must designate Chief AI Officers.

Title: NIST AI 600-1 GenAI Profile
Summary: Provides a cross-sectoral AI Risk Management Framework.
Impact Notes: Voluntary but highly influential for industry standards.
